name: Cluster Tower
description:
Cluster Tower is an Arkanoid-style game where you will help a skeleton return to the tower and reclaim their rightful place at the top. Along the way, there will be those who want to hinder your return, such as vicious spiders who build barriers with their webs, swarms of bats that block your path, and machines that create obstacles. Only by overcoming all of these challenges can you emerge victorious.

Game Features:
  • Engaging gameplay experience
  • Beautiful colorful visuals
  • Many dangerous types of blocks
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Family friendly
